TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttributes extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用來控制 序列化與還原序列化物件方式的屬性 (Attribute) 物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the serializes and deserializes an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立會覆寫預設值的程序方式序列化類別執行個體。Creating the is part of a process that overrides the default way the serializes class instances. 例如，假設您想要序列化的 dll 無法存取來源所建立的物件。For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL which has an inaccessible source. 使用，您可以加強，或是控制如何將物件序列化。By using the , you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized. 成員類別直接對應到一系列控制序列化的屬性類別。The members of the class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization. 例如，屬性必須設定為，可讓您覆寫序列化的欄位或屬性，藉由指示序列化為 XML 文字的屬性值。For example, the property must be set to an , which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the to serialize the property value as XML text. 屬性，以控制序列化的完整清單，請參閱。For a complete list of attributes that control serialization, see the . 如需有關使用與類別，請參閱[How to： 指定的 XML 資料流的替代項目名稱](~/docs/standard/serialization/how-to-specify-an-alternate-element-name-for-an-xml-stream.md)。For more details on using the with the class, see [How to: Specify an Alternate Element Name for an XML Stream](~/docs/standard/serialization/how-to-specify-an-alternate-element-name-for-an-xml-stream.md). ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別的執行個體`Orchestra`，其中包含名為的單一欄位`Instruments`所傳回的陣列`Instrument`物件。The following example serializes an instance of a class named `Orchestra`, which contains a single field named `Instruments` that returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名為第二個類別`Brass`繼承自`Instrument`類別。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 此範例會建立物件來覆寫`Instrument`欄位--允許欄位接受`Brass`物件-，並將物件的執行個體類別。The example creates an object to override the `Instrument` field--allowing the field to accept `Brass` objects--and adds the object to an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別的執行個體`Orchestra`，其中包含名為的單一欄位`Instruments`所傳回的陣列`Instrument`物件。The following example serializes an instance of a class named `Orchestra`, which contains a single field named `Instruments` that returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名為第二個類別`Brass`繼承自`Instrument`類別。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 此範例會建立物件來覆寫`Instrument`欄位--允許欄位接受`Brass`物件-，並將物件的執行個體類別。The example creates an object to override the `Instrument` field--allowing the field to accept `Brass` objects--and adds the object to an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A class that can provide alternative implementations of attributes that control XML serialization.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並自訂 如何序列化和還原序列化物件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and customizes how the serializes and deserializes an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的預設建構函式類別，而不是使用這個建構函式。Use the default constructor for the class, rather than using this constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Serialization::XmlAnyAttributeAttribute ^ XmlAnyAttribute { System::Xml::Serialization::XmlAnyAttributeAttribute ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlAnyAttributeAttribute ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the to override.
The to override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以套用至成員傳回的陣列上還原序列化的物件。The can be applied to a member that returns an array of objects on deserialization. 這可讓還原序列化而沒有相對應的成員物件的任何屬性還原序列化-因此這些項目會以 「 不明 」 。This allows the to deserialize any attributes that do not have a corresponding member in the object being deserialized--thus those elements are "unknown" to the . 當 XML 資料流已改變由 XML Web 服務，或所知的隨機資料一定會包含 XML 資料流，這非常有用。This is useful when the XML stream has been altered by an XML Web service, or when it is known that random data is always included with the XML stream. 屬性可讓您覆寫的成員序列化已套用。The property allows you to override the serialization of a member to which the has been applied.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XmlAnyElements As XmlAnyElementAttributes

summary.span: 取得要覆寫的 物件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects to override.

value.span: 物件，表示 物件的集合。

span.span: An object that represents the collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以套用至成員傳回的陣列上還原序列化的物件。The can be applied to a member that returns an array of objects on deserialization. 這可讓還原序列化而沒有相對應的成員物件的任何項目還原序列化-因此這些項目會以 「 不明 」 。This allows the to deserialize any elements that do not have a corresponding member in the object being deserialized--thus those elements are "unknown" to the . 當 XML 資料流已改變由 XML Web 服務，或所知的隨機資料一定會包含 XML 資料流，這非常有用。This is useful when the XML stream has been altered by an XML Web service, or when it is known that random data is always included with the XML stream. 屬性可讓您覆寫序列化成員，才能成為其成員函式的已套用。The property allows you to override the serialization of a member to function as a member to which the has been applied. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新物件，並將它加入至透過存取物件的集合屬性。The following example creates a new object and adds it to the collection of objects accessed through the property. 物件接著會新增至物件用來建立物件。The object is then added to a object which is used to create an object. 用來序列化或還原序列化物件。The is used to serialize or deserialize an object. 若要查看使用的效果屬性，建立 XML 文件藉由執行名為"UnknownElements.xml"`SerializeObject`方法中的`Main`方法。To see the effect of using the property, create an XML document named "UnknownElements.xml" by running the `SerializeObject` method in the `Main` method. 編輯產生的文件，包括其他 （未知） 的項目。Edit the resulting document to include other (unknown) elements. 標記為註解`SerializeObject`呼叫中`Main`方法，並取消註解的呼叫`DeserializeObject`方法，會列印出的名稱和任何的值未知的 XML 項目。Comment out the `SerializeObject` call in the `Main` method, and uncomment the call to the `DeserializeObject` method, which prints out the name and value of any unknown XML element. [!code-cpp[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/CPP/xmlanyover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/CS/xmlanyover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/VB/xmlanyover.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Serialization::XmlArrayAttribute ^ XmlArray { System::Xml::Serialization::XmlArrayAttribute ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlArrayAttribute ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，指定 如何序列化公用欄位或會傳回陣列的讀取/寫入屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a public field or read/write property that returns an array.

value.span: ，指定 如何序列化公用欄位或會傳回陣列的讀取/寫入屬性。

span.span: An that specifies how the serializes a public field or read/write property that returns an array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩種方式以公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性，傳回陣列的已序列化： 預設序列化，並控制的序列化。There are two ways in which a public field or public read/write property that returns an array is serialized by the : the default serialization, and the controlled serialization. 在預設序列化，沒有屬性會套用至成員。In the default serialization, no attribute is applied to the member. 當序列化時，陣列會序列化為 XML 元素的名稱取自成員名稱的巢狀序列巢狀序列的 XML 項目。When serialized, the array is serialized as a nested sequence of XML elements with the XML element name of the nested sequence taken from the member name. 若要更精確地控制序列化，套用欄位或屬性。To control the serialization more precisely, apply an to the field or property. 比方說，您可以變更產生的 XML 項目名稱與預設值為另一個名稱藉由設定屬性設為新值。For example, you can change the generated XML element name from the default to a different name by setting the property to a new value. 屬性可讓您覆寫預設序列化，以及藉由套用控制序列化的成員。The property allows you to override the default serialization, as well as the serialization controlled by applying an to the member. 例如，您可以變更為新值從預設 （成員識別項） 產生的 XML 項目名稱。For example, you can change the XML element name generated from the default (the member identifier) to a new value. 此外，如果您套用給成員，它會覆寫任何，指派給屬性。In addition, if you apply an to a member, it is overridden by any that is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，其中包含名為的欄位`Members`傳回物件的陣列。The following example serializes a class that contains a field named `Members` that returns an array of objects. 用來覆寫欄位的序列化和重新命名的項目名稱`Staff`。The is used to override the serialization of the field, and rename the element name to `Staff`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XmlArrayItems As XmlArrayItemAttributes

summary.span: 取得或設定物件集合，指定 如何序列化項目 (用來插入至公用欄位或讀取/寫入屬性所傳回的陣列)。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of objects that specify how the serializes items inserted into an array returned by a public field or read/write property.

value.span: 包含 物件集合的 物件。

span.span: An object that contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定的衍生的類型，可以插入到公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性所傳回的陣列。The property allows you to specify the derived types that can be inserted into an array returned by a public field or public read/write property. 針對每個您想要的欄位或屬性以接受新的類型，建立物件和它) 所傳回屬性。For each new type you want the field or property to accept, create an object and it to the ) returned by the property. （新的類型必須衍生自已接受的欄位或屬性的型別）。 物件物件，並指定欄位或屬性，包含的物件類型和欄位或屬性的名稱。(The new type must be derived from the type already accepted by the field or property.) the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. 建構與物件之前先呼叫或方法。Construct an with the object before calling or method. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，其中包含名為的欄位`Members`傳回物件的陣列。The following example serializes a class that contains a field named `Members` that returns an array of objects. 兩個會建立物件，以便接受衍生自名為的基底類別的物件欄位`Member`。Two objects are created to allow the field to accept objects that derive from the base class named `Member`. 每個物件加入至透過屬性。Each object is added to the through the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Serialization::XmlAttributeAttribute ^ XmlAttribute { System::Xml::Serialization::XmlAttributeAttribute ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlAttributeAttribute ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，指定 如何將公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性序列化為 XML 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a public field or public read/write property as an XML attribute.

value.span: ，控制將公用欄位或讀取/寫入屬性 (Property) 序列化為 XML 屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: An that controls the serialization of a public field or read/write property as an XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，如果沒有屬性會套用至公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性，它會序列化為 XML 項目。By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element. 您也可以指示來產生 XML 屬性，藉由套用欄位或屬性。You can also instruct the to generate an XML attribute by applying an to the field or property. 屬性可讓您覆寫預設序列化，以及藉由套用控制序列化的成員。The property allows you to override the default serialization, as well as the serialization controlled by applying an to the member. 若要這樣做，請建立並設定其屬性 (例如)。To do this, create an and set its properties (such as ). 若要將新物件指派屬性物件。Assign the new object to the property of an object. 新增物件物件，並指定欄位或屬性，包含的物件類型和欄位或屬性的名稱。Add the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. 最後，建立使用物件並呼叫或方法。Lastly, create an using the object and call the or method. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`，包含屬性，名為`GroupName`;`GroupName`屬性序列化為 XML 屬性。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that contains a property named `GroupName`; the `GroupName` property is serialized as an XML attribute. 此範例會建立和覆寫欄位的預設序列化的物件。The example creates an and an object to override the default serialization of the field. 這個範例會建立特別覆寫屬性，以及的物件設定為屬性物件加入至覆寫指定的成員名稱的物件。The example then creates an to specifically override the property, and the object is set to the property The object is added to the object with the name of the overridden member specified. 最後，是建構及傳回使用物件。Finally, an is constructed and returned using the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XmlChoiceIdentifier As XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，讓您在一組選項間進行區別。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that allows you to distinguish between a set of choices.

value.span: ，可以套用至序列化為 項目的類別成員。

span.span: An that can be applied to a class member that is serialized as an element.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ XmlDefaultValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 項目或屬性的預設值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.

value.span: ，表示 XML 項目或屬性的預設值。

span.span: An that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由套用指定的 XML 項目或 XML 屬性的預設值成員。You can specify the default value of an XML element or XML attribute by applying a to a member. 若要檢查套用的值的結果，應用程式編譯為 DLL 或可執行檔，並將產生的檔案做為引數傳遞至 XML 結構描述定義工具 (XSD.exe)。To examine the result of applying the value, compile the application into a DLL or executable, and pass the resulting file as an argument to the XML Schema Definition tool (XSD.exe). 在 XML 結構描述文件中，預設值指派給`default`屬性。In the XML schema document, a default value is assigned to the `default` attribute. 在下列範例中的預設值為\<動物 > 項目，則 「 Dogs。 」In the following example, the default for the \ element is "Dogs." ``` ``` 若要覆寫預設值，建立並將它指派給。To override the default value, create an and assign it to the . 如果指派給欄位或屬性的值等於該欄位或屬性的預設值不會序列化至 XML 執行個體的值。If the value assigned to a field or property is equal to the default value for that field or property, the does not serialize the value to the XML-instance. 這是因為指定的值可以復原從 XML 結構描述。This is because the assigned value can be recovered from the XML schema. 換句話說，欄位或屬性設為預設值是未設定的對等。In other words, setting a field or property to its own default value is equivalent of not setting it at all. 同樣地，如果未不設定任何值的欄位或屬性，如使用結構描述中找到的預設值。Likewise, if no value is set for the field or property, the uses the default value found in the schema. 同時案例、 （將屬性設定為其預設值，或未設定），在 XML 文件執行個體不包含任何屬性的值。In both cases, (setting the property to its default, or not setting it at all), the XML-document instance does not contain any value for the property. 您可以指派預設值，而不是結構描述使用類別建構函式。You can use the class constructors instead of the schema to assign the default values. 如果您使用 Xsd.exe 從結構描述產生類別，您可以標記為註解或移除的所有 [System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute("myFieldName")] 屬性的類別檔案。If you are using Xsd.exe to generate a classes from schemas, you can comment out or remove all of the [System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute("myFieldName")] attributes from the class files. ## Examples 下列範例會示範名為類別`Pet`，其中包含具有預設值設定為"Dog"的欄位。The following example shows a class named `Pet` that contains a field that has a default value set to "Dog". 不過，此範例也會建立物件，並設定其屬性為新的預設值 ("Cat")。However, the example also creates an object, and sets its property to a new default value ("Cat"). 這會覆寫原始的預設值。This overrides the original default value. 因此，如果欄位值設定為"Cat"，會將它視為預設值，並不將其序列化。Thus, if the field value is set to "Cat", the treats it as the default value, and not serialize it. 如果設定為任何其他值，序列化值。If it is set to any other value, the serializes the value. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XmlElements As XmlElementAttributes

summary.span: 取得物件的集合，指定 如何將公用欄位或讀取/寫入屬性序列化為 XML 項目。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that specify how the serializes a public field or read/write property as an XML element.
An that contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對每個覆寫的成員序列化為 XML 項目，您必須加入新至藉由呼叫方法。For each overridden member that is serialized as an XML element, you must add a new to an by calling the method. 根據預設，物件已建立並指派給屬性。By default, an object is created and assigned to the property. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化`Transportation`類別，其中包含名為的單一欄位`Vehicles`傳回。The following example serializes the `Transportation` class, which contains a single field named `Vehicles` that returns an . 此範例適用於兩個屬性至`Vehicles`欄位。The example applies two attributes to the `Vehicles` field. 此範例會建立兩個物件，並將它們加入至集合物件。The example creates two objects and adds them to the collection of an object. 若要允許要接受不同的物件類型的陣列物件加入至物件。To allow the array to accept different object types, the object is added to the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Serialization::XmlEnumAttribute ^ XmlEnum { System::Xml::Serialization::XmlEnumAttribute ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlEnumAttribute ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，指定 如何序列化列舉型別 (Enumeration) 成員。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes an enumeration member.

value.span: ，指定 如何序列化列舉型別成員。

span.span: An that specifies how the serializes an enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於每個您想要覆寫的識別項，您必須建立物件，並設定屬性會覆寫的識別項。For each identifier you want to override, you must create an object, and set the property to an that overrides the identifier. 新增物件物件，並同時指定的類別，其中包含列舉型別，並覆寫的成員名稱。Add the object to the object and specify both the of the class that contains the enumeration, and the overridden member name. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化名為兩個類別`Food`和`FoodType`。The following example serializes two classes named `Food` and `FoodType`. `FoodType`類別包含兩個列舉型別，會覆寫，且每個列舉，此範例會建立物件，它會指派屬性物件。The `FoodType` class contains two enumerations that are overridden and, for each enumeration, the example creates an object that it assigns to the property of an object. 此範例會接著將物件物件，用來建立。The example then adds the object to an object, which is used to create an . [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool XmlIgnore { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，指定 是否要序列化公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether or not the serializes a public field or public read/write property.

value.span: 如果 必須不序列化欄位或屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，所有公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性會由序列化。By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the . 也就是說，每個公用欄位或屬性的值會保存為 XML 項目或 XML 文件執行個體中的 XML 屬性。That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML-document instance. 若要覆寫欄位或屬性的預設序列化，請建立物件，並設定其屬性`true`。To override the default serialization of a field or property, create an object, and set its property to `true`. 物件物件，並指定包含的欄位或屬性，以略過的物件類型和欄位或屬性，以略過的名稱。 the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore, and the name of the field or property to ignore. 如果會套用至欄位或屬性中，欄位或屬性會被忽略。If an is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored. 不過您可以建立覆寫該行為物件，並設定其屬性`false`，將它加入至物件，指定的欄位或屬性，包含的物件類型和名稱欄位或屬性。However you can override that behavior by creating an object, setting its property to `false`, adding it to an object specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`，其中包含名為`Comment`的套用。The following example serializes a class named `Group`, which contains a member named `Comment` to which the is applied. 此範例會建立物件和集合屬性`false`，藉此覆寫。The example creates an object, and sets the property to `false`, thereby overriding the . [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Xmlns { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，指定當物件包含傳回已覆寫 物件的成員時，是否要保留所有的命名空間宣告。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to keep all namespace declarations when an object containing a member that returns an object is overridden.

value.span: 如果應該保留命名空間宣告，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the namespace declarations should be kept; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例包含名為類別`Student`。The following example contains a class named `Student`. 這個類別包含名為`MyNamespaces`傳回物件。The class contains a member named `MyNamespaces` that returns an object. 此範例會建立物件加入至執行個體類別。The example creates an object that is added to an instance of the class. 屬性設定為`true`，它會指示保留命名空間時的序列化`Student`物件會覆寫。The property is set to `true`, which instructs the to preserve the namespaces when the serialization of the `Student` object is overridden. [!code-cpp[XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example/CPP/xmlns.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example/CS/xmlns.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example/VB/xmlns.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Serialization::XmlRootAttribute ^ XmlRoot { System::Xml::Serialization::XmlRootAttribute ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlRootAttribute ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，指定 如何將類別序列化為 XML (Root Element)。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a class as an XML root element.

value.span: ，覆寫類別屬性為 XML 根項目。

span.span: An that overrides a class attributed as an XML root element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件物件，和物件。The following example creates an object, an object, and an object. 此範例將指派至屬性物件，並將加入物件物件。The example assigns the to the property of the object, and adds the object to the object. 最後，此範例會取得物件，並傳遞要序列化的類別物件。Lastly, the example gets the object by passing the of the serialized class to the object. (在此範例中，是`Group`。)(In this example, the is `Group`.) [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlRoot Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlRoot Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlRoot Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTextAttribute ^ XmlText { System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTextAttribute ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTextAttribute ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，指定 將公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性序列化為 XML 文字。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that instructs the to serialize a public field or public read/write property as XML text.

value.span: ，覆寫公用屬性或欄位的預設序列化。

span.span: An that overrides the default serialization of a public property or field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性會序列化為 XML 項目由。By default, a public field or public read/write property is serialized as an XML element by the . 不過，它可以強制的欄位或屬性序列化為 XML 文字，藉由套用欄位或屬性。However, it can force the field or property to be serialized as XML text by applying an to the field or property. > [!NOTE] > 無法套用至欄位或屬性會傳回陣列。The cannot be applied to a field or property that returns an array. 若要覆寫的欄位或屬性 （也就不會傳回陣列） 的預設序列化，請建立並將它指派給屬性物件。To override the default serialization of a field or property (that does not return an array), create an and assign it to the property of an object. 新增物件物件，指定類型的物件，其中包含覆寫的欄位或屬性，以及覆寫的欄位或屬性的名稱。Add the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the overridden field or property, and the name of the overridden field or property. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化命名的類別`Group`，其中包含名為的欄位`Comment`。The following example serializes the class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Comment`. 覆寫預設的方式序列化 欄位中，此範例會建立和物件。To override the default way the serializes the field, the example creates an and an object. 這個範例會建立物件，它會指派屬性，並將物件 （序列化為 XML 文字欄位的名稱） 來物件。The example then creates an object, which it assigns to the property, and adds the object (with the name of the field to be serialized as XML text) to the object. 此範例會建立最後使用物件。Lastly the example creates an using the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTypeAttribute ^ XmlType { System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTypeAttribute ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlTypeAttribute ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，指定 如何序列化套用 的類別。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a class to which the has been applied.

value.span: ，會覆寫套用 至類別宣告 (Class Declaration)。

span.span: An that overrides an applied to a class declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以用來控制如何將類型序列化的。The can be used to control how a type is serialized by the . 例如，根據預設，當序列化的型別，使用 XML 項目名稱與類別名稱。For example, by default, when a type is serialized, the uses the class name as the XML element name. 藉由建立，設定屬性給它，而且建立物件，您可以變更 XML 項目名稱。By creating an , setting the property to it, and creating an object, you can change the XML element name. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並將其指派給屬性物件。The following example creates an object, and assigns it to the property of an object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
